傪字的基本解释

傪
cān

傪
càn
鼓曲名。

傪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cān］
［《廣韻》倉含切，平覃，清。］
［《廣韻》七感切，上感，清。］
形容美好。
[②]［càn］
［《集韻》七紺切，去勘，清。］
鼓曲，击鼓的曲调。
[③]［cǎn］
［《廣韻》七感切，上感，清。］
(1)惨淡；惨伤。参见“傪3悴”。
(2)见“傪3酢”。

傪字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傪； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页114第06
【韻會】【正韻】?倉含切，音驂。【說文】好貌。　又人名。唐有陸傪。

傪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
傪字的起名意思

鼓曲名。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cān］
["Guangyun" Cang Hanqie, Pingtan, Qing. ]
["Guangyun" has seven senses, the upper sense, and the clear. ]
Describe beautiful.
[②]［càn］
["Ji Yun" seven cuts, go to survey, clear. ]
Drumming, drumming tune.
[③]［cǎn］
["Guangyun" has seven senses, the upper sense, and the clear. ]
(1) Dismal; traumatized. See "Nuo 3 Hao".
(2) See "Nuo 3 酢".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傪; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 114 06
[Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun]? Cang Hanqie, sound straight. [Speaking] Good-looking.　Another name. Tang has Lu Nuo.
